name: water-pulse
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.
